attributes.action: Cease forthwith any and all aid being given to the country and people of Sudan, in the light of it's repressive and theocratic regime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the treatment of the British Teacher, Gillian Gibbons, in Sudan, we should stop giving aid to that country until such time as it ceases to be a theocracy, and becomes part of the international democratic community of nations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
